sentences.en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentences.en: New snowboarding facilities should attract more people.
sentences.cn: 新建的滑雪板运动设施应该会吸引更多的人。

sentences.en: The facilities have been adapted to give access to wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 这些设施已经改造过以方便轮椅使用者进入。

sentences.en: The facilities have improved beyond all recognition.
sentences.cn: 这些设备经过大幅度的改良，都让人认不出来了。

sentences.en: The home is situated within easy access of shops and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 房子位置便利，距离商店及其他设施都不远。

sentences.en: The hotel amenities include health clubs, conference facilities, and banquet-ing rooms.
sentences.cn: 饭店的便利设施包括健身俱乐部、会议设施和宴会厅。

sentences.en: The island offers a wide range of offshore banking facilities.
sentences.cn: 这座岛上有很多离岸金融机构。

sentences.en: The leisure facilities are there for the use of guests.
sentences.cn: 这些休闲设施是供客人使用的。

sentences.en: The retrofit program will be carried out at the Montreal facilities.
sentences.cn: 蒙特利尔将要开展市政设施的翻新改良工程。

sentences.en: The slim booklets describe a range of services and facilities.
sentences.cn: 这些薄薄的小册子介绍了一系列服务和设施。

sentences.en: They remain the main providers of sports facilities.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然是体育设施的主要提供商。

sentences.en: Water and electric hook-ups are available and facilities are good.
sentences.cn: 水和电都可以接通，设施也很不错。

sentences.en: We're trying to get the medical facilities up and running again.
sentences.cn: 我们正努力让这些医疗机构恢复正常运营。

sentences.en: What matters for most scientists is money and facilities.
sentences.cn: 对多数科学家来说，资金和设备是至关重要的。

sentences.en: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.cn: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

sentences.en: You will have full use of all the new leisure club facilities.
sentences.cn: 你可以充分享受俱乐部的所有新增休闲设施。

trans.tran_cn: 工具，（学习、做事的）天资，（机器等的）特别装置，（供特定用途的）场，设备( facility的名词复数)，容易，能力，灵巧
trans.tran_en: Facilities are buildings, pieces of equipment, or services that are provided for a particular purpose
